title: Where can I find out the schedule for bridge openings on the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge?
text:
Generally, it opens on request from ships that need passage, although
there are some exceptions sometimes for such things as bridge repair
work. Here's a copy of the navigation rule:



Code of federal Regulations

Title 33, Volume 1:

 



Sec. 117.5  When the drawbridge must open.



    Except as otherwise authorized or required by this part,
drawbridges 

must open promptly and fully for the passage of vessels when a
request 

or signal to open is given in accordance with this subpart.



[USCG-2001-10881, 71 FR 70308, Dec. 4, 2006]
